about_the_game:
At Your Service is a wacky co-op party game for up to four players. Visit futuristic and fantasy themed homes, and get them clean and tidy before their owner’s get angry! Just don’t let the bumbling wizards casting spells, or grumpy dads making coffee distract you from making a clean getaway!



Unique worlds and characters!


Drive your own company van and explore three distinct zones. Visit the suburban homes of the 80’s, sci-fi homes of the future, and even a wizard’s magic castle!

Expand your cleaning crew along the way by unlocking a team of diverse playable characters. But watch out for the unique cast of funny home owners determined to get in your way, including dads throwing tantrums, kids setting off explosives and even wizard’s summoning lightning storms!


Complete the crazy tasks any way you can!


Washing dirty clothes, trimming overgrown bushes, and disposing of magic potions is just the start. Whether it’s using experimental teleporters or bewitched moving platforms, use any means necessary to complete the task at hand. Just make sure the owners don’t catch you lying down on the job!
